Children's Palace, institution where children can take part in various extracurricular activities

husband and wife in youth, companions in old age

definition: a flower may blossom again, but a person cannot get young again (proverb)
pinyin: hua1 you3 chong2 kai1 ri4 , ren2 wu2 zai4 shao4 nian2
containing_words.word: 花有重开日，人无再少年

sentences.english: Putin describes his younger self as a poor student and a "hooligan."
sentences.chinese: 普京把少年时的自己形容成差生。

sentences.english: Cultural garbage is the main reason to bring out youngsters crime.
sentences.chinese: 文化垃圾是诱发青少年犯罪的重要原因。

sentences.english: The image of youth comes from the artist's self-reflection and expression of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 少年的形象是出于作者对自我情绪的反思和表达。

sentences.english: Youth and juveniles are the main part of immoralities on web.
sentences.chinese: 青少年是互联网上不道德行为的重要主体。

sentences.english: Moral and em o tional education is rather essential in teenagers' moral development.
sentences.chinese: 道德情感教育对青少年道德成长具有重要作用。

sentences.english: The owner and small dust is all quite surprised, might it not be this white dress is the youth also a coquette?
sentences.chinese: 老板和小尘都十分惊讶，莫非这白衣少年也是狐狸精？

sentences.english: The health of adolescents also has an intergenerational effect.
sentences.chinese: 青少年健康也有代际影响。

sentences.english: Very far away from the juvenile Teacher decades have not seen a few noodle.
sentences.chinese: 老师离少年很远，几十年也没见过几面。

sentences.english: We court risk more avidly as teens than at any other time.
sentences.chinese: 法庭审讯青少年的冒险行为比其他任何时候都多。

sentences.english: So the young man， even the young man the prophet， went to Ramothgilead.
sentences.chinese: 于是那少年先知往基列的拉末去了。

sentences.english: The young who break the law & commit a crime are both vermin & victims .
sentences.chinese: 违法犯罪的青少年既是害人者，又是受害者。

sentences.english: And David said unto the young man that told him, Whence art thou?
sentences.chinese: 大卫问报信的少年人说，你是哪里的人。

sentences.english: How good, I love the boy he also loved me.
sentences.chinese: 多好，我深爱的少年他也深爱着我。

sentences.english: School-aged children and teens need at least 9 hours of sleep a day.
sentences.chinese: 学龄童和青少年每天至少睡9小时。

sentences.english: Unable to control themselves, some teenagers get hooked by online games.
sentences.chinese: 由于缺乏自控能力，一些青少年迷恋于网上游戏。

sentences.english: Being drunk or high can impact teens’ judgment and decision making skills.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒或吸毒会影响青少年的判断能力和做决定的技能。

definition: still possessing the innocence of childhood (idiom)
first awakening of love (usually of a girl) (idiom)
